thread.title: Very comfortable bed, excellent situation for the museums.
thread.title_full: Very comfortable bed, excellent situation for the museums. - Review of Fraser Suites Queens Gate, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: christine G
title: Very comfortable bed, excellent situation for the museums.
text:
We stayed overnight. The apartment was pleasant and perfect for the Natural history, Science and V&A museums.
Disappointed not to be able to go up to the room and freshen up as the check in is from 4pm.
Room Tip: higher floors reasonably quiet See more room tips
